mistral:7b-instruct: This HMO plan from MyOwn Health Insurance fits your profile primarily due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care, which aligns well with managing hypertension. The plan's high coverage limit of $500,000 provides significant financial protection while maintaining an affordable monthly premium of $340, making it suitable for upper-middle income individuals. However, remember that the plan has a deductible of $2500 and a maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6500, so be sure to factor those costs into your decision as well. This plan excludes cosmetic procedures, experimental treatments, and out-of-network services, ensuring you'll have coverage for essential health needs.
